snippet.title: Indie Game "Romp of Dump" Promotional Movie
snippet.description:
This is the game introduction PV of "Romp of Dump", the visual novel of observation of a scum prisoners.
Here's the long version, including part of the intro at the beginning of the game!

Wouldn't you like to play with dangerous prisoners, make them suffer defeat and humiliation, and have your heart broken by their darkness?
"Romp of Dump" is the perfect game for women who want to enjoy such immorality.

Early Access version available for free on Steam!


【Steam】
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1951520/Romp_of_Dump
✨The number of downloads on Steam exceeded【20000】🎉
✨The number of wish list registrations on Steam has exceeded【2600】🎉

【itch.io】
https://zakurosuke.itch.io/romp-of-dump

【Official Site】
http://zakurobento.starfree.jp/RompOfDump

#live2d #indiegame #visualnovel


【What is "Romp of Dump"?】
Animated in Live2D! Visual Novel of Observation of a Scum Prisoners!
In a prison called a dump, a betting card game among dangerous prisoners begins. Penalty game for the losers! Uncover the hidden pasts and bizarre crimes of these lunatics!

It includes four casino-style mini-games, including "Blackjack," and a visual novel tailored to short stories.
It is a mini-game + visual novel that can be enjoyed in a short time.

Live2D animated standing drawings with a high range of motion animate a variety of facial expressions and gestures to color the conversational drama.
The total number of motions for all characters is more than 200, and each character has more than 100 different facial expressions!

The ability to recognize small gestures and changes in facial expressions and dialogue of unique characters determines the winner, allowing players to enjoy playing games against the CPU.


【Credit】
■Narration
音読さん　https://ondoku3.com/ja/
No voiceover narration is provided in the game.

■BGM
https://dova-s.jp/

■SE
https://pocket-se.info/
https://soundeffect-lab.info/
https://on-jin.com/
https://otologic.jp/
https://sounddictionary.info/

For other credits, please check the official website.
http://zakurobento.starfree.jp/RompOfDump#Credit
